title: Pressure Reducing Valve (PRV) Control
description: The system needs to adjust a PRV to manage pressure in a water distribution zone with changing demand.

tasks.description: Monitor the real-time pressure downstream of the PRV.
As demand decreases overnight, the downstream pressure begins to rise.
tasks.expected_outcome: System detects the rising pressure trend.

tasks.description: Send a command to the PRV's actuator to modulate it towards the closed position, maintaining the target downstream pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully adjusts the PRV to lower the pressure.
